sentences.en: "It's all show," said Linus. "The girls don't take it seriously."
sentences.cn: “全是装的，”莱纳斯说。“女孩子们不会拿它当真的。”

sentences.en: Fortunately for me, my friend saw that something was seriously wrong.
sentences.cn: 对我来说幸运的是，我的朋友发现了非常严重的错误。

sentences.en: Forty-one people are said to have been seriously hurt.
He treated them seriously and, on occasion, entertained them hilariously.
sentences.cn: 他对待他们严肃认真，偶尔又逗得他们捧腹不已。

sentences.en: In November 1941 Payne was seriously ill with pneumonia.
It criticises the main contractor for seriously erring in its original estimates.
sentences.cn: 它批评主要承包商在其最初估价中犯了严重的错误。

sentences.en: It’s time we talked seriously about our relationship.
sentences.cn: 我们该认真谈一谈我们的关系了。

sentences.en: Parents, to paraphrase Philip Larkin, can seriously damage your health.
sentences.cn: 菲利普·拉金的意思是：父母可能会严重损害你的健康。

sentences.en: Some unfortunate person passing below could all too easily be seriously injured.
sentences.cn: 从下面经过的倒霉蛋儿很容易受重伤。

sentences.en: The management will have to think seriously about their positions.
sentences.cn: 管理层将不得不认真考虑他们的立场。

sentences.en: The phrase was not meant to be taken seriously.
The pictures were sensationalist and could seriously disturb younger readers.
sentences.cn: 这些图片大肆渲染，会让一些比较年轻的读者们惶恐不安。

sentences.en: These folks clearly take this ballroom thing very seriously.
sentences.cn: 这些家伙显然很拿舞厅这事当回事。

sentences.en: These gases would seriously damage the patient's respiratory system.
sentences.cn: 这些毒气会严重损害患者的呼吸系统。

sentences.en: They seriously believe that capital punishment is a deterrent.
sentences.cn: 他们真的相信死刑具有威慑作用。

sentences.en: Yasin had seriously hurt himself while trying to escape from the police.
sentences.cn: 亚辛试图从警察手中逃脱时受了重伤。

words.tran_cn: 严肃的，严重的；认真的；庄重的；危急的

phrases.tran_cn: 严肃认真对待某人（或某事）

trans.tran_en: in a way that is not joking, especially because something is important
